messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Weather, cold summers
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Dawn F ... yes, we DO look like a bunch of *prunes* from having been out in the sun so much  ... we re now swimming @ night b/c the water is TOO HOT
messages.messageBody:
Hi Dawn F ...

yes, we DO look like a bunch of *prunes* from having been out in the sun so
much <G> ... we're now swimming @ night b/c the water is TOO HOT during the
day, just glad we don't have to worry about getting the boys up/ready for
SCHOOL!!! we've enjoyed watching the stars pop out every evening and the
bats eating their late night *snacks* (hehe, sounds like an old Hitchcock
movie, doesn't it???) ...

as a matter of fact, our weatherman said the high that's been sitting over
Tx for the past few days is from ARIZONA ~~>> sooooooooo PULEEZE TAKE IT
BACK!!! lol ...

Pris ~> who'z fanning herself as she types :I
WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my cats
have learned how to type ...




----- Original Message -----
From: "Dawn Falbe" <NumoAstro@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 05, 2000 2:04 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Weather, cold summers



> Sorry Pris... I have no sympathy for you as we live in Tucson, AZ
> where that "dry heat" they keep talking about is at 100 degrees today
> and we've had this weather since the end of April this year. It's
> one of the reasons we are moving to Colorado next year as I cannot
> stand another summer indoors. The swimming pool gets a bit old and I
> will get even older looking if I stay out in the sun too much longer
> (LOL)
>
> Dawn F
